description: Boost your JavaScript skills with hands-on projects and intermediate concepts for modern web development.
aboutCourse: This course focuses on strengthening your core JavaScript knowledge through real-world coding exercises, covering DOM manipulation, ES6+ features, async programming, and basic debugging techniques.
whatYouWillLearn: Deep understanding of ES6+ JavaScript features
Working with asynchronous code using Promises and async/await
targetAudience: JavaScript learners looking to move beyond the basics
Developers aiming to sharpen their frontend JavaScript skills
